title: Salada Senkada
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Buffet, Sri Lankan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located within a print shop, this place offers a lunch rice & curry buffet. There is a downstairs option for a casual vibe, and an upstairs option in air conditioned room with a larger range of rice and curries. Meat is served separately. Everything is labelled, and staff will point out what's vegan.
